attributes.action: Stop Tesco and other PRIVATE companies from accessing DVLA database
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tesco are currently running an ANPR system to read your number plate on the way in and out of their car park, with the excuse of charging you £70 if you stay for more than 3 hours.
With your registration number, Tesco are able to access the personal details of the keeper of the vehicle directly from the DVLA database.

We must stop this before they start to abuse the system by sending junk mail to your home address.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop Tesco and other PRIVATE companies from accessing DVLA database."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18961


Prime Minister's Office
